components.title: Regenerative Territories
components.text: Changing the world while changing your way of

components.content:
Our vision is to empower small
villages and rural areas to
become the place to be

Our mission is to co-create an ecosystem that triggers a positive impact, accompanying each stage of territorial regeneration through
education, responsible tourism, sustainable finance & decentralised technology
We are a network of professionals, corporates, educational and territorial entities with extensive knowledge in areas like travel, education, communities, sustainability, economy and technology

components.title: Changing Territories
components.description: Are you looking for active citizens, social entrepreneurs making a difference and responsible travelers?

components.title: Travel Artisans
components.description: Are you looking for a growing customer base, a season free income and a network of like-minded people?

components.title: Impact Contributors
components.description: Are you looking for transformative experiences, sustainable reputation and impact projects to support?

components.title: Lifestyle Seekers
components.description: Are you looking for a better work-life balance, a deeper connection with nature and people and ways to generate a positive impact?

slides.image: <svg width="71" height="48" viewBox="0 0 71 48" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><circle cx="18" cy="24" r="17.5" transform="rotate(90 18 24)" fill="#60C971" style="mix-blend-mode:multiply"/><circle cx="18" cy="24" r="17.5" transform="rotate(90 18 24)" stroke="#60C971"/><ellipse cx="47" cy="24" rx="24" ry="24" transform="rotate(90 47 24)" fill="#646FFF" style="mix-blend-mode:multiply"/></svg>
slides.title: Prosperity
slides.description: We support creative and innovative entrepreneurial project ideas by activating personalised training paths and community funds

slides.title: People
slides.description: We empower community enterprises owned and operated by its active members where citizens, public, private entities openly and transparently govern the territory

slides.title: Planet
slides.description: We support the preservation of the environmental resources and the territorial biodiversity participating in the climate change fight

slides.title: Identity
slides.description: We enhance local culture by supporting artisanship, food heritage, wellbeing and art activities in order to develop a sustainable territorial identity
